section.note: The client's online media streaming function will soon be discontinued. If you have not integrated this function, Agora recommends that you do not use it. For details, see part of the service removal plan.

plentry.pd: Width of the injected stream in the interactive live streaming. The default value is 0 (same width as the original stream).
Height of the injected stream in the interactive live streaming. The default value is 0 (same height as the original stream).
Video GOP (in frames) of the injected stream in the interactive live streaming. The unit is frame. The default value is 30 fps.
Video frame rate of the injected stream in the interactive live streaming. The default rate is 15 fps.

pd.p: Video bitrate of the injected stream in the interactive live streaming. The default value is 400 Kbps.
pd.note: @note The setting of the video bitrate is closely linked to the resolution. If the video bitrate you set is beyond a reasonable range, the SDK sets it within a reasonable range.

pd.p: Audio-sample rate of the injected stream in the interactive live streaming: #AUDIO_SAMPLE_RATE_TYPE. The default value is 48000 Hz. Relevant links:
pd.note: @note We recommend setting the default value.

pd.p: Audio bitrate of the injected stream in the interactive live streaming. The default value is 48.
pd.note: @note We recommend setting the default value.

pd.p:
Audio channels in the interactive live streaming.
1: Mono (default)
- 2: Stereo
pd.note: @note We recommend setting the default value.
